TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EncoderValue extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Used to specify the parameter value passed to a JPEG or TIFF image encoder when using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SaveAdd%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SaveAdd%2A> method of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> object, you can pass parameters to the image encoder by passing an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameters> object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SaveAdd%2A> method. An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameters> object contains an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter> objects. Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter> object has an array of values and an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder> property that specifies the parameter category. The EncoderValue enumeration provides names for some of the values that can be passed to the JPEG and TIFF image encoders.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue ColorTypeCMYK = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue ColorTypeYCCK = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue CompressionCCITT3 = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies the CCITT3 compression scheme. Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue CompressionCCITT4 = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies the CCITT4 compression scheme. Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue CompressionLZW = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies the LZW compression scheme. Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the Compression category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue CompressionNone = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Specifies no compression. Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue CompressionRle = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Specifies the RLE compression scheme. Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue Flush = int32(20)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a multiple-frame file or stream should be closed. Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the save flag category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue FrameDimensionPage = int32(23)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a frame is to be added to the page dimension of an image. Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the save flag category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue FrameDimensionResolution = int32(22)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue FrameDimensionTime = int32(21)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue LastFrame = int32(19)

Docs.summary: Specifies the last frame in a multiple-frame image. Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the save flag category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue MultiFrame = int32(18)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the image has more than one frame (page). Can be passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the save flag category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue RenderNonProgressive = int32(12)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue RenderProgressive = int32(11)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue ScanMethodInterlaced = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue ScanMethodNonInterlaced = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue TransformFlipHorizontal = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the image is to be flipped horizontally (about the vertical axis). Can be passed to the JPEG encoder as a parameter that belongs to the transformation category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue TransformFlipVertical = int32(17)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the image is to be flipped vertically (about the horizontal axis). Can be passed to the JPEG encoder as a parameter that belongs to the transformation category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue TransformRotate180 = int32(14)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the image is to be rotated 180 degrees about its center. Can be passed to the JPEG encoder as a parameter that belongs to the transformation category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue TransformRotate270 = int32(15)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the image is to be rotated clockwise 270 degrees about its center. Can be passed to the JPEG encoder as a parameter that belongs to the transformation category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue TransformRotate90 = int32(13)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the image is to be rotated clockwise 90 degrees about its center. Can be passed to the JPEG encoder as a parameter that belongs to the transformation category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue VersionGif87 = int32(9)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderValue VersionGif89 = int32(10)

Docs.summary: Not used in GDI+ version 1.0.
